resources.string: Tap a button below to access the tutorials or the settings. If you need help, tap the help button in the bottom right corner.
Tap a button below to view tutorials in that group.
Tap a button below to learn more about that tutorial:
The Texting Tutorial will teach you the following:

Opening up The message App, Creating and sending a text message, understand the keyboard, replying to a text message, Creating and replying to a group message, and sending images and videos through a text
Tapping the screen to press buttons, swiping motions up and down the screen to scroll.
Home button takes you to the first screen of the app, back button takes you to the previous screen you were on, help open the help screen.

Tutorials are grouped in categories. Pressing on a tutorial button takes you sets of tutorial in that category. You can choose from the list of tutorials by pressing on it to watch and/or read more about it.
Tap a button to see Accessibility options or Notification
There is no notification at this time. Please come back later!
Tap a button to customize your accessibility options
